string-array.name: steps
string-array.item: will be the pineapple peeled, cut into the shape you want, and then soaked with salt water to remove astringency, then drain water stand-by
will cheese slices in accordance with pineapple shape, then put in pineapple drain water on
will be placed in all two strawberry, cheese slices, toothpicks can be fixed
tips: the top strawberry can replace with any fruit
